name: HS1 Limited
goal: Infrastructure Manager with a Concession to operate the high-speed railway line from London St Pancras International to the Channel Tunnel.
interests: Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Internal Market, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Railway Packages and associated Delegated Agreements and Implementing Acts.

Transport policy, particularly in relation to the arrangements between road and rail.
